name: SCP: Rulebreaker
storyline:
After the opening of Site 1730, only Sites 15 and 19 remain active. Complex 1730 was the most secure, but a new director hastened its downfall. As a guard, surviving the madness of anomalies is vital.
Survive and find the way out.
summary: Dive into the heart of horror with this survival game inspired by the mysterious SCP Foundation. After the opening of Site 1730, once the stronghold of the Foundation, chaos has erupted. All sites, except Sites 15 and 19, have been abandoned, converging towards Complex 1730. An unprecedented concentration of anomalies released during a containment breach has left the complex in a state of desolation. Step into the shoes of a Foundation guard, facing the ultimate survival challenge as the horrors of anomalies threaten to engulf everything.
